hadiths.text: ‘Urwah reported on the authority of ‘A’ishah mentioning the incident of slander. She said:The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) sat and unveiled his face and said: “I take refuge in Allah, All-Hearing, All-Knowing from the accursed devil. Lo! They who spread the slander are a gang among you.” Abu Dawud said: This is a rejected (munkar) tradition. A group of narrators have reported this tradition from al-Zuhri; but did not mention this detail. I am afraid the phrase concerning “seeking refuge in Allah” is the statement of Humaid

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ لَمْ يَرَ الْجَهْرَ بِـ { بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَنِ الرَّحِيمِ }
chapter.eng-name: Those Who Do Not Say That "Bismilaahir-Rahmanir-Rahim" Should Be Said Aloud
